welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tuusula, Finland! Get ready to be charmed by our picturesque lakes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore the city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or a code after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
